name: Move User Roles
author: Alsvin

sections.description:
Move User Roles WordPress plugin allow site admin to change users roles easily, select users with their existing roles and assign them another role in just two simple steps.

Features:

  • Very light weight
  • Change user roles in just 2 steps
  • Simple to user interface
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to Dashboard > Tools > Move User Roles to migrate your site users from one role to another
sections.faq:
Is the add-on is compatible with the Latest version of WordPress?

Yes, all our add-ons are compatible with the latest version of WordPress.
sections.changelog:

  • Fix – Compatibility issues with WordPress 5.9

1.1.1

  • Fix – Compatibility issues with WordPress 5.8

1.1.0

  • New – Added feature to change role for specific user

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Move User Roles WordPress plugin allow site admin to change users roles easily. Move site users from one user role to another user role in two steps.
description:
Move User Roles WordPress plugin allow site admin to change users roles easily, select users with their existing roles and assign them another role in just two simple steps.

Features:

  • Very light weight
  • Change user roles in just 2 steps
  • Simple to user interface

screenshots.caption: Go to WordPress Admin Dashboard > Tools > Move User Roles
Select roles in Existing Roles and New Roles to Assign fields and click Move User
Congratulations! you have moved your users from one role to another
